A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Non-Spoiler Review: This installment of the Star Wars Saga has fans divided. The problem is\, it's for the wrong reasons. Fans complained when TFA was too much like ANH. Now that TLJ is different and completely unpredictable\, they're crying it's not like ESB. It's not perfect\, but it takes Star Wars into new places and in a direction I didn't see coming. Ep IX will certainly be interesting. I suggest going through some old EU books and comics to explore some things that were incorporated into the film. I also suggest seeing it more than once. Your initial viewing will be skewed by your excitement and worry.
